page_limit_info: Number of items shown per page. The number of items cannot be less than 10.
new_password_info: When password field is empty the password will not be updated.
theme_info: If theme is empty the global value is used.
expires_info: Date when the user account expires. The account is not deleted, but user can not login anymore.
current_password_mismatch: Your current password did not match to the one in database.
you_need_to_enter_both_passwords: You need to enter both passwords.
could_not_add_user_because_user_already_: Could not add user, because user %s already exists.
user_with_id_does_not_exist: User with ID %s does not exist.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete user %s?
failed_to_update_user_profile_error: Failed to update user profile. Error: %s
profile_of_user_modified_successfully: Profile of user %s was modified successfully.
no_subusers: No subusers are available to be assigned to a group. Please create subuser accounts.
info_group: From this page it is possible to determine user groups. You can assign servers to group so that they are availble for all of the group users.
group_name_empty: Group name can not be empty.
could_not_add_user_to_group: Could not add user %s to group %s, because already belongs.
could_not_add_server_to_group: Could not add server to group %s, because already belongs.
could_not_delete_server_from_group: Could not delete server %s from group %s.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_group: Are you sure you want to delete group %s?
